sections.name: Prepare Repository
sections.description: Set up the repository to work

commands.title: Get help
commands.subTitle: Prints synopsis and list of most commonly used commands

commands.title: Initialize Repository
commands.subTitle: Create a new empty repository in current directory

commands.title: Clone a Repository
commands.subTitle: Clone the repository at the url

sections.name: Configure
sections.description: Configure git with your name and e-mail address

commands.title: Get Configuration
commands.subTitle: Get configuration value for the current name

commands.title: Unset Configuration
commands.subTitle: Unset configuration value for the current name

commands.title: Change Editor
commands.subTitle: Change editor used for writing commit messages

commands.title: Print Status
commands.subTitle: Prints the status of the working directory, showing changed files

commands.title: Add file to index
commands.subTitle: Adds file or directory to the index to be included in the next commit

commands.title: Remove file from Index
commands.subTitle: Removes current file or directory from index

commands.title: Discard Changes
commands.subTitle: Discards all changes made to the file

commands.title: Remove File
commands.subTitle: Deletes file from the working directory

commands.title: Commit Changes
commands.subTitle: Commits the changes made with the message
